name: Ghost Town (itch) (Kristopher Yu)
description:
A small project made using construct to test out how the program works. You control a ghost on a trip back to their resting place. 

HOW TO PLAY:

1. Open construct using this link:https://editor.construct.net/

2. Press "File" on the top right

3. Select "Ghost Town-1.c3p"

4.  Select the "Beginning" tab

5. Press the play button on the top.
